lead_paragraph: The Ryder Cup loss at Medinah is what accelerated Steve Stricker's plan to reduce his schedule after 2012.

headline.print_headline: Stricker Felt Both Sides of Powerful Ryder Cup Allure
headline.main: Stricker Felt Both Sides of Powerful Ryder Cup Allure
